job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Applied Researcher to join our dynamic Generative AI team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs), and Machine Learning. You will be responsible for developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models to further empowering our buyers and sellers. You will work closely with engineering and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers to create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services., * Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP, LLMs, and multimodal LLMs to drive innovation within the team and push the boundaries of what is possible.
     * Lead and significantly contribute to one or more technical areas of research in NLP to deliver high quality solutions for our customers.
     * Design, develop, and refine NLP applications and large language models, ensuring they are robust, scalable, and effective.
     * Collaborate closely with multi-functional teams, including Engineering, Product Management, Quality Assurance, and Operations, to integrate research outcomes into practical applications.
     * Maintain a high profile both internally and externally, sharing knowledge and findings through conferences, workshops, publications, and open-source contributions.
     * Cultivate partnerships with other research teams to create synergistic technologies that enhance overall product experiences.
     * Continuously monitor advancements in AI, LLM, NLP, and related fields to ensure the team remains at the cutting edge.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Applied Researcher to join our dynamic Generative AI team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs), and Machine Learning. You will be responsible for developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models to further empowering our buyers and sellers. You will work closely with engineering and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers to create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services., * Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP, LLMs, and multimodal LLMs to drive innovation within the team and push the boundaries of what is possible.
     * Lead and significantly contribute to one or more technical areas of research in NLP to deliver high quality solutions for our customers.
     * Design, develop, and refine NLP applications and large language models, ensuring they are robust, scalable, and effective.
     * Collaborate closely with multi-functional teams, including Engineering, Product Management, Quality Assurance, and Operations, to integrate research outcomes into practical applications.
     * Maintain a high profile both internally and externally, sharing knowledge and findings through conferences, workshops, publications, and open-source contributions.
     * Cultivate partnerships with other research teams to create synergistic technologies that enhance overall product experiences.
     * Continuously monitor advancements in AI, LLM, NLP, and related fields to ensure the team remains at the cutting edge.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with Large Language Models (LLMs), Natural Language Processing (NLP), and developing applications around these technologies, including fine-tuning and integrating them into products. While it mentions 'Machine Learning' and 'deep learning models', the specific focus on LLMs and generative AI applications aligns more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: developing and implementing sophisticated deep learning models
Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies in NLP, LLMs, and multimodal LLMs
Lead and significantly contribute to one or more technical areas of research in NLP
Design, develop, and refine NLP applications and large language models
Continuously monitor advancements in AI, LLM, NLP, and related fields
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, adaptation, and refinement of machine learning models, with a specific emphasis on deep learning, NLP, and LLMs, which are core to generative AI.

phrases: create new capabilities from initial algorithms and out to features in our products and services
integrate research outcomes into practical applications
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the need to translate research and model development into tangible features within products and services, requiring software development skills for integration.

phrases: deliver high quality solutions for our customers
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand how the technical work contributes to business objectives, customer satisfaction, and product enhancement.

phrases: work closely with engineering and multi-functional NLP and platform engineers
Collaborate closely with multi-functional teams, including Engineering, Product Management, Quality Assurance, and Operations
Maintain a high profile both internally and externally, sharing knowledge and findings through conferences, workshops, publications, and open-source contributions
Cultivate partnerships with other research teams
job_tasks.justification: These phrases emphasize the importance of working with various teams, sharing knowledge, and building partnerships, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

phrases: Conduct research on the latest technologies and methodologies
Continuously monitor advancements in AI, LLM, NLP, and related fields
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a requirement to stay updated with the rapidly evolving field of AI and NLP, demonstrating a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: push the boundaries of what is possible
Lead and significantly contribute to one or more technical areas of research
job_tasks.justification: These phrases suggest a proactive approach, a drive for innovation, and taking leadership in research areas, aligning with innovation and ownership.
